title: Get this 256GB external SSD while it’s only $43.99
content:
Macworld

The Polar Wolf Aluminum Ultra is a portable 256GB SSD with ultra-speedy transfer abilities and could make bringing work files to and from the office more manageable. This portable file storage has been temporarily marked down from $75 to $43.99.

This external SSD doesn’t need any drivers to be installed. It’s a plug-and-play storage device that automatically enters sleep mode after 10 minutes of inactivity. The Polar Wolf also comes with an adaptive cable that has USB-A and USB-C connectors, so you can use it for file storage from a wide variety of devices whether you use iOS, Android, Mac, or Windows. 

The compact size of the drive makes it easy to carry, fitting comfortably in the palm of your hand and facilitating convenient file management while traveling. Plus, the sturdy aluminum design means you have a little less to worry about when you’re storing essential files. A little bump in your luggage or computer bag is nothing to worry about. 

If you want to store your essential files without needing an internet connection or cloud services, get the Polar Wolf Aluminum Ultra Portable External SSD for just $43.99.
